Reviews.Title: Nokia Phone
Reviews.Author: Sakinia Cox
Reviews.Content: I always thought Nokia phones were the best - haven't been disappointed...yet. Takes good pictures; am able to download games and apps. Keep up-to-date with my contacts and the news, etc.  Very good phone.

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900mhz Quad-Band
Supported 3G bands- 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100mhz
TFT capacitive high resolution touchscreen
8 GB of internal storage with 256 MB RAM
Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, Bluetooth v2.1 with A2DP, EDR
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia Lumia 610BK Unlocked World Windows Mobile Phone with 5MP Camera, 3G, Touchscreen, 8GB Memory and Wi-Fi - No Warranty - Black
